xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.ShermanTank
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.ShermanTank
xwikidoc.content:
## SEARCH AND BROWSE BY SUBJECT TRANSLATION PAGE

## I am making a global assumption that I only need to include strings that are not already covered in classes. To see the lookup strings for the classes, go here. XWiki/GlobalClassTranslation

## If a string has the word "placeholder" after the "= " sign, it means text is coming. If it is blank after the "= " sign, that means the string can be ignored until further notice.

## CONFIGURATION
search.results.max= 500
## SEARCH ENTRY BOX AND OVERALL ITEMS

search.text.entry.label= masukkan terminologi pencarian
search.text.entry.button= Cari »
search.text.entry.help.link= Tips Pencarian
search.text.entry.help.title= Tips Pencarian

## Tab titles
##{0} is tab name, {1} is search result count, and {2} is the total count
search.tab.title.results= {0} ({1})
search.tab.title.resultsmax_exceeds= {0} ({2})


## Search Tips Page
search.text.entry.help.text=

search.text.entry.help.button= Tips Pencarian
search.find.no.results= Tidak hasil pencarian yang sesuai dengan kriteria pencarian Anda. Silahkan coba lagi.
search.find.no.results.button= OK
search.advanced.search.button= Pencarian Lebih Detil

search.columns.menu.columns= Kolom
search.columns.menu.sort_ascending= Urutkan Secara Menaik
search.columns.menu.sort_descending= Urutkan Secara Menurun

search.pagination.pagesize.addbefore= -
search.pagination.pagesize.before= Tunjukkan
search.pagination.pagesize.after= Hasil
search.pagination.pagesize.addafter=

search.pagination.displaying.resource= Memperlihatkan Bahan Ajar {0} - {1} tentang {2}
search.pagination.displaying.resource_resultsmax_exceeds= Displaying Resources {0} - {1} of the Top {2}

search.pagination.displaying.group= Memperlihatkan Grup {0} - {1} tentang {2}
search.pagination.displaying.group_resultsmax_exceeds= Displaying Groups {0} - {1} of the Top {2}

search.pagination.displaying.member= Memperlihatkan Anggota {0} - {1} tentang {2}
search.pagination.displaying.member_resultsmax_exceeds= Displaying Members {0} - {1} of the Top {2}

search.pagination.displaying.blog= Memperlihatkan Blog {0} - {1} tentang {2}
search.pagination.displaying.blog_resultsmax_exceeds= Displaying Blogs {0} - {1} of the Top {2}

search.pagination.displaying.curriki= Memperlihatkan halaman {0} - {1} tentang {2}
search.pagination.displaying.curriki_resultsmax_exceeds= Displaying Pages {0} - {1} of the Top {2}

## Pagination Buttons
search.pagination.first.button= << Pertama
search.pagination.prev.button= < Sebelumnya
search.pagination.next.button= Selanjutnya >
search.pagination.last.button= Terakhir >>

## Pagination Buttons Rollovers
search.pagination.beforepage= Halaman
search.pagination.afterpage= tentang {0}
search.pagination.afterpage_resultsmax_exceeds= of {0}
search.pagination.first= Halaman Pertama
search.pagination.prev= Halaman Sebelumnya
search.pagination.next= Halaman Selanjutnya
search.pagination.last= Halaman Terakhir
search.pagination.refresh= Refresh

## Dave not sure if you want to follow the CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass naming convention.

## CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_any= Reviews: Apa Saja
## CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_P= Partner
## CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_highest_rated= Highest Rated

search.resource.review.selector.highest_rated= Dirating Tinggi oleh CRS

## I don't think there is a Class I can model after here.

search.resource.special.selector.updated= Hanya yang Baru-baru Ini Dibaharui
